des:
IoTify skillset is developed to manage the Volansys IoTify enabled IoT Gateway and end devices connected with IoTify cloud via gateway.
 
Volansys Technologies company delivers the integrated IoT Gateway named as Centauri-200, Homebridge-100, Homebridge-200, and Modular Gateway for your smart home’s devices controlling and monitoring.
 
These gateways support Zigbee, Zwave, and BLE based lighting devices like Dimmable Bulb, Dimmable Smart plug, Dimmable relays.
 
Using IoTify Alexa skillset users can discover the lighting devices connected with Volansys gateway and users can trigger commands like on/off the light, change the brightness of the light. 
 
While enabling IoTify Alexa skill on Amazon Alexa application, users have to log in using IoTify mobile application credentials. Or the user can sign up to create a new IoTify account. Also, users have to provision gateway and end-devices using IoTify mobile applications.
 
The user account is the same for IoTify Alexa skill enable and IoTify Mobile application with the same credentials. iOS and Android mobile apps are available in the respective stores.
 
IoTify enabled device can be operated with below commands:
Rename your IoTify enabled device with simple names like Lamp, Light, Kitchen, Office, etc. This makes command easier.
 
Discover devices:
-Alexa, Discover the devices
 
Turn on/off lighting device:
-Alexa, turn on lamp
-Alexa, turn off lamp
 
Change brightness:
-Alexa, dim lamp
-Alexa, set lamp to 50 percent
-Alexa, increase lamp brightness to 50 percent
-Alexa, decrease lamp brightness to 30 percent
-Alexa, increase lamp by 10 percent
-Alexa, decrease lamp by 10 percent
